languages.text: "Странное чувство тогда проникло в мой разум... Будто шепот, повторяющий: "Отдайся зову крови. Будь зверем".
"I felt something strange in my mind then... Like a low growl, over and over, saying, 'Rip. Tear. Blood. Kill. Beast.'"
languages.original_text: "Странное чувство тогда проникло в мой разум... Будто шепот, повторяющий: "Отдайся зову крови. Будь зверем".

traits.locale_text: "I felt something strange penetrate my mind then... Like a whisper, over and over, saying, 'Surrender to the call of blood. Be a beast.'"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I felt something strange penetrate my mind then... Like a whisper, over and over, saying, 'Surrender to the call of blood. Be a beast.'"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I felt something strange penetrate my mind then... Like a whisper, over and over, saying, 'Surrender to the call of blood. Be a beast.'"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I felt something strange in my mind then... Like a low growl, over and over, saying, 'Rip. Tear. Blood. Kill. Beast.'"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Sentí que algo extraño invadía mi mente... Era como un susurro que repetía "Rasga. Desgarra. Sangre. Muerte. Bestia"».
languages.original_text: "I felt something strange in my mind then... Like a low growl, over and over, saying, 'Rip. Tear. Blood. Kill. Beast.'"

traits.locale_text: «Sentí que algo extraño invadía mi mente... Era como un susurro que repetía "Ríndete a la llamada de la sangre. Conviértete en bestia"».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “随后，我感觉到某种古怪的东西渗入了我的脑海……就像低吼，一遍又一遍地重复，‘厮杀、鲜血、屠戮、野兽。’”
languages.original_text: "I felt something strange in my mind then... Like a low growl, over and over, saying, 'Rip. Tear. Blood. Kill. Beast.'"

traits.locale_text: “随后，我便感觉到某种古怪的东西渗入了我的脑海……就像耳语一样，一遍又一遍地说，‘臣服于鲜血的召唤吧，成为野兽吧。’”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「頭の中が変な感じがして…低く唸るように、何度も何度も言うんだ。『引き裂け、切り裂け、血だ、殺せ、獣になれ』って」
languages.original_text: "I felt something strange in my mind then... Like a low growl, over and over, saying, 'Rip. Tear. Blood. Kill. Beast.'"

traits.locale_text: 「何か奇妙なものが俺の頭の中に入り込むのを感じた…ささやき声のようなものが、何度も繰り返し言うんだ。『血の呼び声に応えよ。獣になれ』とな」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai senti quelque chose d'étrange dans mon esprit... Comme un grondement sourd qui m'invitait sans cesse à frapper, déchiqueter, verser le sang et tuer. Comme une bête sauvage. »
languages.original_text: "I felt something strange in my mind then... Like a low growl, over and over, saying, 'Rip. Tear. Blood. Kill. Beast.'"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai senti quelque chose s'introduire dans mon esprit... Une sorte de murmure qui m'invitait sans cesse à m'abandonner à l'appel du sang et à libérer la bête sauvage qui sommeille en moi. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Dann habe ich etwas Merkwürdiges in meinem Verstand gespürt ... Wie ein tiefes Knurren, wieder und wieder, und es sagte: 'Zerreißen. Zerfetzen. Blut. Töten. Bestie."
languages.original_text: "I felt something strange in my mind then... Like a low growl, over and over, saying, 'Rip. Tear. Blood. Kill. Beast.'"

traits.locale_text: "Dann habe ich gespürt, wie etwas Merkwürdiges in meinen Verstand eindringt ... Wie ein Flüstern, wieder und wieder, das sagt: 'Gebt Euch dem Ruf des Blutes hin. Seid eine Bestie.'"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "I felt something strange in my mind then... Like a low growl, over and over, saying, 'Rip. Tear. Blood. Kill. Beast.'"

languages.text: "Zihnimde tuhaf bir şey hissettim. Sonra sessiz bir hırlama, beynimin içinde yankılandı. 'Parçala. Yırt. Kan. Öldür. Canavar.' deyip duruyordu."
languages.original_text: "I felt something strange in my mind then... Like a low growl, over and over, saying, 'Rip. Tear. Blood. Kill. Beast.'"

traits.locale_text: "Zihnimde tuhaf bir şey hissettim. Sonra sessiz bir hırlama, beynimin içinde yankılandı. 'Parçala. Yırt. Kan. Öldür. Canavar.' deyip duruyordu."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
